snippet: Pop culture, and numerous comedians, have been influenced by Steven Wright’s singular way with a joke.
abstract: Jason Zinoman On Comedy column celebrates Steven Wright, arguing that his cerebral jokes and low-energy, lethargic delivery have exerted a strong influence on the current generation of comics and pop culture as a whole; holds that while Wright's star may have faded, his legacy has only grown.
lead_paragraph: Pop culture, and numerous comedians, have been influenced by Steven Wright’s singular way with a joke.

headline.seo: Steven Wright’s Offbeat Humor Has Nurtured Other Comics
headline.main: Headwaters for a River of Stand-Up
headline.print_headline: Headwaters for a River of Stand-Up
